long: Meaning: "as far" (or "long", or "much") "as", whether of space ("even unto") or time ("during", "while", "until") or degree ("equally with").  Usage: against, and, as, at, before, by (that), even (to), for(-asmuch as), (hither-) to,   how long, into, as long (much) as, (so) that, till, toward, until, when, while, (  as) yet.  Source: properly, the same as "H5703" (used as a preposition, adverb or conjunction; especially with a preposition);
